petNameAdd:
1) State of Assam
    Advocate - Sri DK Deka

acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Case record is received on commitment. I/O has submitted charge sheet u/s 366A,343,376(2) IPC R/W Sec 8 of POCSO Act. Cognizence taken. Issue summon to the accused and also notice to the bailor.

Accused remained absent. Summon issued to the accused is not yet returned. Issue reminder to the OC concern. Also notice issued to bailor is returned after being duly served. Bailor is absent with a prayer to fixex another date and same is accepted.

Accused person remained absent.Summon issued to the accused is not yet returned.Issue NBWA against the accused.Bailor of the accused is present and filed a petition praying for another date to produced the accused person and same is accepted.

Accused  Dipak Kerai remained absent.NBWA issued against the accused is returned unexecuted with a prayer to fixed another date and same is accepted.Bailor of the accused is present and filed a petition praying for more time to produced the accused person in court and same is also accepted.

Accused remained absent.NBWA issued against the accused is returned unexecuted with a report that the accused persons is not tracable.Issue fresh NBWa and P/A against the accused. Also bailor of the accused is present and filed a petition praying for time to produced the accused person in court and same is accepted.

Accused Dipak Sattar has surrendered before the court and filed a petition praying for allowing him to  go on  bail stating the ground mention in the petition.  Heard learned lawyers of both sides.Perused the case record.Considering all aspects the accused person is allowed to go on bail of Rs.30,000/- with a local surety of like amount.
Accused present.Charges framed.issue summon to PWs.
Accused Deepak Sattar  is present  with his learned counsel. No pw is present. Summons issued to pws is returned. Issue summons to pws.

Accused Dipak Sattar is absent with steps showing cause of his absence and same is accepted .No PW is present.Summon issued to Pws  Swarnalata Sarin and  Gabrul Sarin are returned after service.Issue bailable warrant of RS.1000/- against them.
Accused Dipak Sattar is present.Two Pws present.They are examined cross examined and discharged.Issue summon to rest PWs on next date.
accused is present. PWs absent. summons issued to pws returned without execution. issue fresh summons to PWs
accused present. PW Jeena Dang Kerketa and Sumitra Kashyap are examined cross-examined and discharged. Issue summons to rest PWs

Accused Dipak Sattar is present.    PWs Smt junu Guipai and Smt. Minati Lagori are present, but could not be examined due to paucity of time. The said PWs are allowed to go on PR Bond of Rs.100/-each. Issue fresh summons to them.
accused present.PWs Smt. Minati Lagori and Smt. Junu Guipai are examined, cross-examined and discharged. issue summons to M.O and I.O
Accused Dipak Sattar is present.       PWs Dr.(Mrs) Mercy Rongpharpi is present. She is examined, cross-examined and discharged. Issue summon and W.T message to I.O        Fixing 15.11.19 for I.O
accused present.IO absent. Summon not returned. Issue fresh
accused present.IO absent. summon not returned. issue fresh
Accused present.IO absent. issue fresh summon and WT
CR recd with CD on transfer from Hon DJKA for disposal.        Accd Dipak Sattar present.      IO absent, issue summons to him.
